description:
A female student of Butei High School, childhood friend of Kinji. Enrolled in Butei`s special department known as SSR. Butei rank A. She`s the current student council chairman, and president of various clubs like the gardening club, handicraft club, and girl`s volleyball club. A perfect Japanese beauty according to Kinji, except for one flaw - jealousy, which turns her into a berserker who assaults any girl approaching Kinji. When she finds out that Aria is living with Kinji she goes as far as trying to murder her. She is shown to love Kinji to the point that she will do anything for him. Kinji and Shirayuki kissed on episode 8, and since then, Shirayuki`s feelings for Kinji has increased to the point that she is willing to show her nudity to Kinji in order for him to notice her. She uses a Japanese sword named Irokane Ayame as a weapon of choice. It is revealed that her name, Shirayuki, was an alias to hide her real name, Himiko.
Source: Wiki
name: Hotogi Shirayuki
